mapper.select: SELECT R.ROOM_IMG FROM LODGMENT L join ROOM R ON (L.LODGMENT_NO = R.LODGMENT_NO) WHERE R.LODGMENT_NO = #{lodgmentNo}

SELECT R.ROOM_NO, R.ROOM_PRICE, R.ROOM_CAPA, R.ROOM_INFO, R.ROOM_IMG, R.ROOM_NAME, R.ROOM_QUANTITY, L.LODGMENT_NO, L.COMPANY, L.ADDRESS, L.HOST_PHONE ,check_reserve_func(#{checkin}, #{checkout}, R.ROOM_NO) AS enable, L.LOCATION,case LODGMENT_TYPE when 'A1' then '모텔' when 'A2' then '호텔' when 'A3' then '펜션' when 'A4' then '게스트하우스' end LODGMENT_TYPE, (select count(*) from RESERVATION where LODGMENT_NO = #{lodgmentNo} and MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) member_no FROM LODGMENT L join ROOM R ON (L.LODGMENT_NO = R.LODGMENT_NO) WHERE R.LODGMENT_NO = #{lodgmentNo}

SELECT p.POSTSCRIPT_CONTENT, r.ROOM_NAME, l.LODGMENT_NO, m.member_nick, p.GRADE, p.POSTSCRIPT_NO FROM POSTSCRIPT p JOIN ROOM r ON p.ROOM_NO = r.ROOM_NO JOIN LODGMENT l ON p.LODGMENT_NO = l.LODGMENT_NO JOIN MEMBER m ON p.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO AND l.LODGMENT_NO = #{lodgmentNo} order by p.POSTSCRIPT_NO desc

SELECT p.POSTSCRIPT_CONTENT, r.ROOM_NAME, l.LODGMENT_NO, m.MEMBER_NICK, p.GRADE, p.POSTSCRIPT_NO, p.POSTSCRIPT_TITLE, p.POSTSCRIPT_DATE FROM POSTSCRIPT p JOIN ROOM r ON p.ROOM_NO = r.ROOM_NO JOIN LODGMENT l ON p.LODGMENT_NO = l.LODGMENT_NO JOIN MEMBER m ON p.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO AND p.POSTSCRIPT_NO = #{postscriptNo} order by p.POSTSCRIPT_NO desc

SELECT p.POSTSCRIPT_CONTENT, r.ROOM_NAME, l.LODGMENT_NO, m.MEMBER_NICK, p.GRADE, p.POSTSCRIPT_NO, p.POSTSCRIPT_TITLE, p.POSTSCRIPT_DATE FROM POSTSCRIPT p JOIN ROOM r ON p.ROOM_NO = r.ROOM_NO JOIN LODGMENT l ON p.LODGMENT_NO = l.LODGMENT_NO JOIN MEMBER m on p.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO AND l.LODGMENT_NO = #{lodgmentNo} ORDER BY p.POSTSCRIPT_NO DESC
select R.ROOM_NO,R.ROOM_NAME from LODGMENT L join ROOM R on(L.LODGMENT_NO = R.LODGMENT_NO) where R.LODGMENT_NO = #{lodgmentNo}
